name: @volkovasystem/format-json-file
description: Reformat JSON file to use hard tab and double quotes.

scripts.clean: rm -rfv ./node_modules || true && rm -fv ./package-lock.json || true && npm cache clean --force
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rm -rfv ./format-json-file.js || true && rm -rfv ./.build || true && rm -rfv ./.test || true
scripts.bundle: npx parcel build ./*.module.js --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-minify --target node --out-dir ./.build --out-file ./format-json-file.js --global formatJSONFile && mv ./.build/format-json-file.js ./format-json-file.js && rm -rfv ./.build || true
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run compress
scripts.stage: npm run reset && npm install && npm run build && npm test && npm run clean

author: Richeve S. Bebedor <richeve.bebedor@gmail.com>
